data.title: Fiat’s Elkann Says Talks for Marelli Partner Include Samsung
data.meta_description: Fiat Chrysler Automobiles NV Chairman John Elkann confirmed the carmaker is holding talks with several potential partners, including Samsung Electronics, to strengthen its car-parts unit Magneti Marelli.
data.text:
Elkann says he discussed several topics with Samsung’s Lee

Marelli in talks with various potential partners, Elkann says

Fiat Chrysler Automobiles NV Chairman John Elkann confirmed the carmaker is holding talks with several potential partners, including Samsung Electronics, to strengthen its car-parts unit Magneti Marelli.

“We discussed this and other topics,” Elkann said in Turin, when asked if he had talks on Marelli with Samsung Electronics Vice Chairman Lee Jae Yong on Aug. 29 when the two met in Turin at Exor SpA’s board meeting. "Samsung has important interests in the insurance business and, as we own the re-insurer PartnerRe, there are several possible commercial ties."
